name: Fire Snake
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

special_abilities.name: Heated Body.
descriptions: A creature that touches the snake or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The snake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Tail.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
